title: Default values not shown in Show Report Parameters dialog
OB: When opening the Enter Parameters dialog in the software, all values are empty, even though default values have been set for the report parameters. This requires the user to input all the values again when they only intended to modify one parameter.
EB: When clicking the Show Report Parameters button and opening the Enter Parameters dialog, the default values should be shown in the value box. This will allow users to easily modify the parameter they want to change without having to input all the values again.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create several report parameters.
2. Set default values for the report parameters.
3. Drag the report parameters to the layout.
4. Click the Show Report Parameters button and observe that the default values are not shown in the Enter Parameters dialog.
